data.title: 1204 Thomas Lane, Graham, TX 76450
data.meta_description: 1204 Thomas Lane, Graham, TX 76450 is a 3 beds, 2 baths, 2047 SqFt Single Family Residence home. View property details, photos, school and neighborhood data, and more.

Overview

Visits:

0

Welcome home to this gorgeous one story, home! Make your way inside and immediately feel the warm welcome of natural sunlight flowing throughout. This home boasts top-notch finishes including custom cabinetry, stone countertops, stained concrete floors and neutral colors throughout. The open floorplan is perfect for entertaining. The kitchen has a granite island, stainless steel appliances, and large walk-in pantry. Enjoy working from home in the study or use as a playroom or additional dining area. The spacious master suite features a large shower, dual vanities and two walk-in closets. The oversized laundry room has space for an additional refrigerator. Start your day with a cup of coffee on the covered patio. Home is fully landscaped featuring lush grass, sprinklers, a large shed and privacy fence. Not only is this home move in ready, but it is energy efficient, including the oversized insulated garage. Don't miss out on this beautifully maintained, home, both inside and out!!!
